title: Inclusive Virtual Education Design: Building Science Learning Environments for All

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning tools and secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Operating a MOOC-based course applying UDL principles with diverse learners in a blended learning environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design science learning materials by applying the three UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles (representation, action & expression, engagement).
Learners can construct inclusive virtual learning environments by utilizing accessibility features of various digital tools.
Learners can evaluate and improve science education content on MOOC platforms by applying UDL guidelines.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
